content.description: I wouldn't presume to be the first to do this line, but after the crimp on Tabernacle broke onto my head (there is a first time for everything), we figured out a different line going right instead.Â Start in two slots to the left of a sloping rail/shelf, work your way right across the rail then diagonally up and right to a solid hold.
content.location: Follow the overall description for approaching Sanctuary boulders. Shrine will be on the northwest side of the boulder field. Be warned, there are many boulders out here that look similar to each other. but Shrine will have a very identifiable rail/sloping shelf on the south side.

content.description: Shrine can be found west of The Continental boulder.  The boulder appears strikingly clean when hiking up to the north side, but hike around the back to find the climbs on the south side.  The Sanctuary map on Old Pueblo Bouldering may be of use when navigating this area.
